content:
I'm so glad you mentioned "The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo"! Yes, I'm familiar with the book, and it's been getting a lot of buzz in the book community. Taylor Jenkins Reid is a popular author known for her contemporary fiction and romance novels, and "Evelyn Hugo" is one of her most beloved books.

I've heard great things about the novel, and it's wonderful that you're enjoying it with your friend! Buddy reads can be such a fun way to experience a book, especially when you have someone to discuss it with.

What do you think of the book so far? Are you enjoying the story, characters, and writing style? I'm curious to know your thoughts!

(And don't worry, I won't spoil anything for you!)
